sections.heading: Purpose of this screen
body: The Plant Details screen is the central place to view and manage a single plant instance created by the user.
It combines plant-specific information, reminders, task actions, sensor readings (if available), and quick navigation tools related to that plant.

sections.heading: Plant information
body: At the top of the screen, the user can see the plant image, plant name, optional plant definition name, and assigned location.
Below the image, detailed parameters provided during plant creation are displayed, such as purchase date, notes, light conditions, orientation, distance from window, pot type, and soil type.
These details help contextualize reminders, readings, and plant care decisions.

sections.heading: Plant-level actions (3-dot menu)
body: The 3-dot menu associated with the plant header provides additional actions related to the plant itself.
Available actions include viewing the Plant Definition (if the plant is linked to one), editing plant details, changing the plant image, and navigating to Reminders filtered for this plant.
Changing the image allows replacing a predefined image, adding a user photo from the phone, or removing the image.

sections.heading: Plant Definition
body: If the plant is linked to a Plant Definition from the Flovers database, the user can open a dedicated Plant Definition view.
This view displays species-level information such as plant description, care preferences, traits, difficulty level, temperature range, humidity, toxicity, and growth characteristics.
Plant Definitions provide general guidance and should be interpreted in the context of the user’s actual environment.

sections.heading: Reminders and tasks
body: The Reminders section shows all active reminders associated with this plant.
Each reminder can be accessed via its own 3-dot menu, allowing the user to complete tasks, edit the reminder, or view task history.
Completing a task may include adding a note, which becomes part of the plant’s care history.

sections.heading: Latest readings
body: If the plant is linked to a reading device, the latest sensor readings are displayed directly on this screen.
Supported readings include air temperature, air humidity, light level, and soil moisture.
This section shows the most recent values along with the timestamp of the last received reading.

Tapping the readings tile redirects you to the Readings History screen, where detailed charts and summaries (daily/weekly/monthly) are shown for temperature, humidity, light, and soil moisture (as long as a device is linked to the plant).

sections.heading: QR code and quick access
body: Each plant has a unique QR code displayed at the bottom of the screen.
Scanning this code using the Scanner view redirects the user directly to this Plant Details screen.
The QR code can be saved to the device or emailed, making it easy to print and attach to a plant pot for quick access.

sections.heading: Important notes
body: User-added plant images are stored only on the user’s device and are not uploaded to the Flovers backend.
Predefined plant images come from the Flovers backend and may be AI-generated.
Sensor readings and care suggestions are informative and should be combined with the user’s own judgment.
